titles.title: Congratulating the Department of Veterans Affairs on 75 years of psychology training and expansion of access to mental health care for veterans by expressing support for the designation of April 19 through April 23, 2021, as "VA Psychology Recognition Week".

Congratulating the Department of Veterans Affairs on 75 years of psychology training and expansion of access to mental health care for veterans by expressing support for the designation of April 19 through April 23, 2021, as "VA Psychology Recognition Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the support of the House of Representatives for the designation of VA Psychology Recognition Week.
